title: Web Application Vulnerability Scan
description: A vulnerability analyst must run a dynamic application security test (DAST) against a new public-facing web application before it goes live.

tasks.description: Configure the DAST scanner with the target application's URL and authentication credentials.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly configures the scan parameters.

tasks.description: Launch the authenticated scan and monitor its progress.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scan runs to completion without errors.

tasks.description: Analyze the scan results, identifying a critical SQL Injection vulnerability, and create a high-priority ticket for the development team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies, prioritizes, and reports the critical finding.
